data.title: Best UV Sanitizers & UVC Cleaning Devices
data.meta_description: At Tool Klean Inc., we produce the best UV sanitizers to eliminate pathogens quickly and efficiently, providing safety for your family, and your business.
data.text:
Stay healthy by destroying germs on frequently used small objects! The Tool Klean UV Sanitizer Cabinet allows you to quickly sanitize small objects using only UV light. This process uses no heat, chemicals or liquids. This UV cabinet is perfect for items like cell phones, credit cards, face masks, and salon tools.

The UV sanitizer box harnesses the power of UV-C light to effectively kill pathogens on small objects. This is a safe and efficient way to maintain cleanliness in your home or professional environment.

The Choice of Professionals

The Tool Klean UV Oven Pro is a UV light sanitizer box. The UV Oven Pro can sanitize items that attract bacteria, viruses, and fungus, including:

Scissors

Nail tools

Cell phones

Glasses

Makeup

Jewelry

Watches

Earbuds

Keys

Pacifiers

It uses ultraviolet type C (UV-C) light with a 253.7nm wavelength. This wavelength is scientifically proven to destroy germs, killing 99.9% of pathogens.

Protect Yourself and Your Stuff

The UV oven pro uses light, not heat, so it is safe for all objects. The tight-fitting polarized door on this UVC sanitizer box prevents UV exposure to people in the room. Proven and laboratory certified to kill 99.99% of staph and salmonella bacteria within 10 minutes. 254 wavelength UVC light can also inactivate viruses.

Sanitizing Objects Should be Easy

The UV Oven Pro does all the work for you. The suspended racks and highly reflective interior surface mean all sides can disinfect at once. Place your objects inside, set the digital timer, close the door, and in 5-10 minutes your items are ready to use.

Adding to the ease of use, this device emphasizes maximum convenience in both home and professional settings. Compact yet spacious, the UV Oven Pro is perfect for a variety of objects.

When Trust Matters

The last thing you want is to get it wrong with the health of those you care for. That’s why the US government has strict regulations. Companies producing UV sanitizing equipment must register with the EPA and receive approval from the FCC.

Tool Klean, Inc’s EPA establishment # is 94836-NY-1.

See the tips below to learn how to spot counterfeit/uncertified/unregistered/unsafe products or products making misleading claims.

Buy with Confidence

Order now to begin quickly and easily sanitizing everyday objects! You’ll receive:

One USA produced 110V UVC sanitizer cabinet with wall mounting capability

Two stainless steel racks

An 8,000hr 8 W quartz glass bulb

One replacement bulb

One bulb cleaning cloth

Instructions for use

This portable UV sanitizer box is your reliable solution for destroying germs, bacteria, and viruses. Our sanitizing boxes feature a meticulous design for ease of use and effectiveness. The UV Oven Pro will give you the confidence to maintain a hygienic environment effortlessly.

You’ll also have the peace of mind that Tool Klean, Inc.’s 1-year manufacturer warranty protects your purchase. Any issues or concerns, our USA based team is here to help!

The Choice of Professionals

The Tool Klean Pro Hot Cup Sanitizer is trusted by salon owners, groomers, barbers, estheticians, and other professionals to sanitize scissors, tweezers, nail tools, eyelash tools, eyebrow tools, dog grooming tools and other metal salon utensils that can collect and spread bacteria, viruses, and fungus if not properly sanitized between uses. It uses high, dry heat, scientifically proven to destroy germs. No liquids or chemicals are used.

Protect Yourself and Your Clients

The sanitizer consists of a hot metal pot filled with glass beads that are heated to 212 degrees fahrenheit. The dry heat radiates through any metal object placed inside the cup, even the parts that aren’t touching the beads, destroying pathogens. The sanitizer has been proven and laboratory certified to kill 99.999% of the most difficult-to-kill bacteria (staph and salmonella) within 3 minutes.

Sanitizing Salon Tools Should be Easy

With the anti-microbial sanitizing hot cup there are no liquids, no chemicals, and no mess. Turn the switch on, wait 15 minutes until the indicator light shows it’s ready, then place your metal tools inside, leaving the lid open. (Metal utensils only, no plastic.) In 3 minutes the tools will be sanitized, helping keep you and your clients safe and healthy!

When Trust Matters

You can’t afford to get it wrong when it comes to the health of your clients. That’s why the US government has strict regulations. Companies producing sanitizing equipment must be registered with the EPA and in line with FDA regulations. Tool Klean, Inc’s EPA establishment # is 94836-NY-1. See the tips below to learn how to spot counterfeit/uncertified/unregistered/unsafe products or products making misleading claims.

Buy with Confidence

Order now to begin quickly and effectively sanitizing salon tools, nail tools, and other metal objects! You’ll receive one USA produced, EPA compliant hot cup glass bead sanitizer with indicator light, one set of quality glass beads for proper heat conduction, and one replacement set of glass beads. You’ll have the peace of mind that your purchase is protected by Tool Klean, Inc.’s 1-year manufacturer warranty. Any issues or concerns, our USA based team is here to help!

Mail

Food

Doorknobs

Counters

Electronics

Other surfaces

Use at home, at work, in the car, at hotels, and anywhere else you go.

This is the best UV sanitizing wand available. You can trust our rigorous laboratory testing process and adherence to EPA and FCC guidelines. 254 nm wavelength light helps to destroy microtoxins, mold, bacteria, viruses, and other pathogens. This wand is lab tested and offers a certified 99.99% pathogen kill in only 90 seconds.

Destroy pathogens without harmful chemicals and toxins. Ditch the mess of sprays and liquid cleaners and forget heat and ozone. Our UV sanitizing wand uses just light to sanitize. Includes a rechargable 10,000 hour bulb.

For safety, always use the included gloves and glasses. Do not use the UV wand while other humans, pets, or plants are in the room. The auto safety switch will turn the wand off if you point it toward your body.

Our UV sanitizer wand includes:

A 1-year manufacturer warranty

A plug adaptor

A cleaning cloth

Safety glasses and gloves

A pouch for travel or storage

Contact us with any questions; our USA-based team is here to help!

UV Disinfection Cart Uses

The Tool Klean Anti-Microbial UVC Cart Sanitizer is a trustworthy tool for professionals in many industries. From churches to hospitals to schools to warehouses, this UVC cart will sanitize surfaces, objects, and more. Using no heat, sprays, or chemicals, our UV Cart can destroy pathogens without making a mess.

Its broad array of applications includes conference rooms, classrooms, dining rooms, hallways, foyers, gyms, sanctuaries, etc. It uses ultraviolet type C light with a 253.7nm wavelength, proven to kill bacteria, viruses, mold, and fungus.

Staying Safe with Our UVC Light Cart

The UV-C lamp rolling cart sanitizer uses only light. It doesn’t emit ozone, which is harmful to humans. The lamp is germicidal. This means that it’s able to destroy germs with only its light.

Our lamp has been laboratory certified to kill 99.9% of the most difficult-to-kill bacteria within 30 minutes. 253.7nm wavelength UVC light can also inactivate viruses.

Safety warnings: Do not expose skin or eyes to UVC light. Do not remain in the room during operation. Remove all pets, plants, birds, and reptiles from the room before treatment.

How to Use the UV Cart Sanitizer

The commercial grade sanitizer makes disinfecting a breeze. Roll into place, set the multi-positional bulb arm to the desired position, and plug in the unit. Set the digital timer to the desired length of time. The delay feature allows exiting the area before the light turns on.

In 15-60 minutes, sanitization will be complete. No sprays, no liquids, no chemicals, no mess. No scrubbing and no hazards.

Up to 99.9% of the most harmful pathogens will be inactivated. Motion sensor shuts off the unit if someone enters the room.

Have Confidence in Our UV Sanitation Light Cart

Don’t let your facility become the center of a sickness outbreak! You can’t afford to get it wrong with the health of others. That’s why the US government has strict regulations.

Companies producing UV sanitizing equipment must register with the EPA and the FCC. Tool Klean, Inc’s EPA establishment # is 94836-NY-1. See the tips below to learn how to spot counterfeit/uncertified/unregistered/unsafe products or products making misleading claims.

Order now to begin easy and effective sanitization! You’ll receive one USA produced UVC light white rolling lamp sanitizer with:

Digital control

Delay timer

Motion sensor

4 locking wheels

Maneuvering handle,

110V power supply cord

2 powerful 55W 8,000hr bulbs

You’ll also have the peace of mind that comes with purchase protection. The UVC Cart Sanitizer is covered by Tool Klean, Inc.’s 1-year manufacturer warranty. If you have any issues or concerns, our USA based team is here to help!

With so many germs these days, why wouldn’t you keep your toothbrush in a sanitizing case when you’re not using it? Protect your oral health with the Tidy Teeth UV Toothbrush Sanitizer by Tool Klean.

The lightweight, highly portable 2.5” x 2” x 1.5” case fits all kinds of brush heads, such as electric and manual toothbrushes. The brush heads stay held in place with an adjustable silicone clamp. Our toothbrush sanitizer UV light will destroy up to 99.9% of pathogens with powerful C-band ultraviolet LED light.

UVC light has the power to sanitize surfaces and objects by destroying pathogens like bacteria and viruses. For something as small as a toothbrush, sanitization only takes 60 seconds.

Keeping Your Toothbrush Germ-Free Should be Easy

Brush your teeth, place your toothbrush in the case, close the lid, and walk away. The UV-C sanitizing light automatically turns on, and in just 1 minute the cycle is over. The light automatically shuts off when cleaning is complete.

This holder contains no chemicals, no ozone, and no fuss, just strong, pathogen-killing UV light. The built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery charges fast in 2 hours and will last 75 cleaning cycles.

Protect Yourself at Home and While Traveling

At home or work, store the case with your toothbrush in it on a bathroom counter, in a cabinet or drawer, or mounted on the wall. When traveling, toss it in with your toiletries and bring it along for the trip.

Whether at home or on the go, you’ll have peace of mind that your toothbrush is always as clean as possible. The auto safety shut-off switch ensures no accidental human exposure to UV light when the lid is open.

Buy with Confidence

The US government has strict regulations. Companies producing UV sanitizing equipment must register with the EPA and receive approval by the FCC. USA-based Tool Klean, Inc’s EPA establishment number is 94836-NY-1. See below to learn how to spot counterfeit/uncertified/unregistered/unsafe products or products making misleading claims.

Order now to quickly, easily, and effectively keep your toothbrush sanitized and free of germs and bacteria.

You’ll receive:

One wireless UV-C light toothbrush case with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery

One USB-C rapid charging cord

You’ll also have the peace of mind that comes with purchase protection from Tool Klean, Inc.’s 1-year manufacturer warranty. If you have any issues or concerns, our USA-based team is here to help!
